GeneDef.label: mind coalescence
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection to other carriers, allowing them to share some of the emotions with them. A portion of average happiness gets shared with mind coalescent individuals. Due to that, they also all share mental states and suffer them at the same time.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This effect is updated twice a day ingame, to avoid lag.

GeneDef.label: gene infector
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene implant a copy of their xenogerm into another person through attacks with their claws or teeth. This in turn triggers a progressing infection in the victim, which if left untreated will apply the carrierâ€™s xenogerm to them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Won't affect anyone who already has this gene.
The gene infector will only transmit xenogenes. Endogenes will not be transmitted.
